Reviews.Title: “Good stay, friendly working staff.”

Reviews.Content: stay hotel due house renovated outstanding customer service service day housekeeping staff isn’t usual stay 4 days housekeepers clean close downtown don’t pay downtown prices breakfast thanks staff stay enjoyable
